column3: Latest;Battambang: Citizens reported that a cow died from wounds that villagers suspect might have been caused by a tiger.------

column1: ------The dead bovine was discovered on December 18th in Samlaut district
column2: Battambang.------Villagers said that the cows had wounds consistent with a tiger attack
column3: and claim------ that last year there were tigers in the area.------People are now afraid  that one day the tiger will enter a village and harm humans.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/751482.html
